channel.title: Help asap please :)
channel.description:
Okay, Guys I Am Connected To My VPS Right Now And I Set The IP to The VPS IP Adress And Compiled.... Now, When I Try To Run The Server It Says: [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] What Do I Do To Get To Run My Server??
Compiler: [code]@echo off title Abandoned Dreams Compiler! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause[/code] Run: [code]@echo off title Abandoned Dreams (RUN) java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]

item.title: Help asap please :)
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay, Guys I Am Connected To My VPS Right Now And I Set The IP to The VPS IP Adress And Compiledâ€¦ Now, When I Try To Run The Server It Says:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
What Do I Do To Get To Run My Server??

Compiler:

@echo off title Abandoned Dreams Compiler! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause
Run:

@echo off title Abandoned Dreams (RUN) java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
